statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - x + 2 , x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 5 , 10 \, x^{3} + 18 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 14 , -5 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 11 , -x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
